scripts.build: npm run rimraf_development && npm run rimraf_production && npm run build_development && npm run uglify_development && npm run copy_development_production
scripts.docker swagger run: docker run --publish 80:8080 --env BASE_URL=/swagger --env SWAGGER_JSON=/swagger.json --volume ./swagger.json:/usr/share/nginx/html/swagger.json --name assist-frontend-swagger-docker-container swaggerapi/swagger-ui
scripts.start development: npm run rimraf_development && npm run build_development && npm run uglify_development && cd environments/development/public_nodejs && node app.js
scripts.start production: npm run rimraf_development && npm run rimraf_production && npm run build_development && npm run uglify_development && npm run copy_development_production && cd environments/production/public_nodejs && node app.js
scripts.update: npm i axios@latest bcrypt@latest body-parser@latest compression@latest cookie-parser@latest cors@latest dotenv@latest express@latest express-force-ssl@latest json5@latest jsonwebtoken@latest mongodb@latest morgan@latest rotating-file-stream@latest swagger-editor-dist@latest swagger-ui@latest swagger-ui-dist@latest @createdbyjurand/node-scripts@latest @types/express@latest @types/mongodb@latest @types/node@latest eslint@latest nodemon@latest prettier@latest rimraf@latest ts-node@latest typescript@latest uglify-js@latest
